Michael Peters wrote:

> Tony,
> 
>   Are you coming over this winter? I'm in Bangkok now but will return to 
> land of the "ever-sitting bureaucrat" the 11th. We could get together with 
> Katsu to discuss armour.

I wish. I'm doing the job search thing right now, and pennies are tight. Sigh.

I keep fantasizing about winning the lottery and making it all irrelevant...

How's Bangkok after Tokyo? Does it feel like home again, or do you feel a bit 
out-of-element? <G>

Tony
